//~: Named after the American folkloric monster.
description: Even looking directly at this cougar and knowing that it is there, a part of your brain simply refuses to see it.  It flickers in and out of sight in a way that makes your eyes hurt, and if you turn your attention away from it even for a moment, it disappears completely.

An American black bear.  A large omnivorous scavenger, it has powerful claws and jaws, and is an effective ambush hunter.  This one is distinguished from its fellows by its intent expression, its lack of caution in your presence, and the fact that it's hovering six inches off the ground.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s stares at %3$s and %3$s is lifted up and pulled towards them!
